events.name: twoHearts
events.details: On a sunny summer day, visit the beach when Alex is there.

events.name: fourHearts
events.details: Enter town between 9am and 4pm.

events.name: fiveHearts
events.details: Enter Alex's house when he's there.

events.name: sixHearts
events.details: Enter Alex's house when he's there.

events.name: eightHearts
events.details: On a sunny summer day, visit the beach when Alex is there. Note: Cannot be triggered after marrying Alex, since he no longer visits the beach.

events.name: tenHearts
events.details: Alex will send you a letter to meet him at the Saloon after dark. After receiving the letter, enter the Saloon between 7pm and 10pm.

events.name: fourteenHearts
events.details: Exit the Farmhouse in year 2+ between 5am and 8:20am on any day other than Sunday. You must have 5,000g available.

events.name: twoHearts
events.details: Enter Elliott's cabin when he's there.

events.name: fourHearts
events.details: Enter the Stardrop Saloon between 3pm and 10pm when Gus is there.

events.name: sixHearts
events.details: Enter Elliott's home when he's there.

events.name: eightHearts
events.details: After receiving a letter from Elliott, visit the museum between 1pm and 7pm. (It doesn't need to be the same day.)

events.name: tenHearts
events.details: Go to the beach on a day when it is not raining between 7am and 1pm. A letter will be sent to you but it is not needed to trigger the event.

events.name: fourteenHearts
events.details: Exit the farm house between 6am and 3pm on a day when there are no Festivals occurring for the next 8 days.

events.name: twoHearts
events.details: Enter George's house while George is there.

events.name: fourHearts
events.details: Enter the clinic when Harvey is there.

events.name: sixHearts
events.details: Enter the general store between 11am and 3pm.

events.name: eightHearts
events.details: Enter the clinic.

events.name: tenHearts
events.details: Harvey sends you a letter asking to meet at the railroad tracks. Go there between 9am and 5pm.

events.name: fourteenHearts
events.details: Enter an upgraded farm house (needs to be upgraded at least twice) between 8pm and midnight.

events.name: twoHearts
events.details: Enter Sam's house when he's there.

events.name: threeHearts
events.details: In any season except winter, enter the beach on a sunny day between 7am and 3pm. This event only happens in Year 1.

events.name: fourHearts
events.details: Enter Sam's house when he's there.

events.name: sixHearts
events.details: On any day when it's not raining, enter the town between noon and 4pm.

events.name: eightHearts
events.details: Sam shows up at your doorstop between 6am and 8am. Only triggers if you've seen his two-heart event.

events.name: tenHearts
events.details: After receiving a letter from Sam, enter the town on a sunny day between 8pm and midnight.

events.name: fourteenHearts
events.details:
Part 1: Enter an upgraded farmhouse (needs to be upgraded at least twice) between 6:10am and 5:00pm, when Sam is inside.
Part 2: Three days later, enter the farmhouse between 6:10am and 5pm, when Sam is inside.
Part 3: Three days later, enter the farmhouse between 6:10am and 5pm, when Sam is inside.
Part 4: Four days later, enter the farmhouse between 6:10am and 5pm, when Sam is inside.

events.name: twoHearts
events.details: Enter Sebastian's room when he's there.

events.name: fourHearts
events.details: Go to The Mountain between 11am and 5pm.

events.name: sixHearts
events.details: Enter Sebastian's room when he's there.

events.name: eightHearts
events.details: Go to the beach on a rainy day between noon and 11pm.

events.name: tenHearts
events.details: Go to The Mountain between 8pm and midnight.

events.name: fourteenHearts
events.details: Go to The Mountain on a rainy day between 6am and 7pm.

events.name: twoHearts
events.details: Enter Cindersap Forest between 8pm and midnight.

events.name: threeHearts
events.details: After reaching 3 hearts with Shane, he will send you a recipe in the mail. He will also become slightly less rude to you during dialogues.

events.name: fourHearts
events.details: Enter Marnie's Ranch at any time.

events.name: sixHearts
events.details: Enter Cindersap Forest between 9am and 8pm while storming or raining.

events.name: sevenHearts
events.details:
Part 1: Enter Marnie's Ranch while Shane is home after triggering Shane's six heart event.
Part 2: Enter the town between 10am and 4pm on a sunny day. (Also requires 2 hearts with both Emily and Clint.)
After reaching 7 hearts with Shane, he will send you a recipe in the mail.

events.name: eightHearts
events.details: Enter Marnie's Ranch while Shane is home.

events.name: tenHearts
events.details: Exit your house before 6:30am to initiate the event, then walk to the Bus Stop between 4pm and 6pm.

events.name: fourteenHearts
events.details: Enter town on a non-Friday between 8am and 5pm. For parts II and III enter town anytime each of the next two days.
